articles.title: Dubai bans privacy tokens, tightens stablecoin rules in crypto reset
articles.description: Dubai's financial regulator said privacy-focused assets are incompatible with global compliance norms as it moves to a firm-led token suitability model and sharper stablecoin classifications.

articles.title: Coinbase pushes back against banks to keep rewarding users for holding stablecoins
articles.description: Disagreements over stablecoin rewards have frayed bipartisan support for the bill, with traders estimating a 68-70% chance of passage this year.

articles.title: Adam Back-backed Bitcoin treasury Future Holdings set for takeover by H100
articles.description: Adam Back-backed Bitcoin treasury Future Holdings has agreed to a takeover proposal from Sweden-listed H100 Group as it eyes expansion into Switzerland.

articles.title: Bitcoin treasury firms linked to Adam Back sign preliminary agreement to combine
articles.description: The proposed deal would take Sweden-based H100 into Switzerland and deepen its institutional bitcoin treasury strategy.

articles.title: Bitcoin's early gains fade fast as prices fall back below $91,000
articles.description: Risk sentiment deteriorates as safe havens outperform and equities weaken.

articles.title: Stablecoins, sanctions and surveillance: Why 2025 reshaped crypto’s regulatory reality
articles.description: From record onchain volumes to geopolitics-driven crypto crime, 2025 structurally shifted how regulators and institutions engaged with digital assets, with stablecoins at the center.

articles.title: Fed rate cuts under fire: 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
articles.description: Bitcoin injected volatility as legal action against the Federal Reserve combined with market nerves over geopolitics at the start of a key week for inflation data.

articles.title: SEC delays PENGU and T. Rowe crypto ETFs as Grayscale seeks options green light
articles.description: The SEC delayed decisions on two crypto ETFs and opened public comments on options tied to a Grayscale multi-asset crypto fund.

articles.title: Tether freezes $182 million in USDT tied to five Tron addresses
articles.description: Tether froze $182 million in USDT across five Tron wallets, highlighting enforcement as stablecoins dominate illicit crypto flows.

articles.title: South Korea proposes 5% limit for listed firms’ crypto exposure
articles.description: The proposed guidelines would allow eligible firms to invest in the top 20 cryptocurrencies by market value.

articles.title: Tether’s role in Venezuela, Iran highlights the duality of stablecoins
articles.description: The dual life of stablecoins: A lifeline for citizens and a tool for sanctioned entities involved in Venezuela and Iran's economic crises.

articles.title: Most US debanking cases stem from government pressure, report says
articles.description: Cato Institute analyst Nicholas Anthony argues the US Congress needs to reform the Bank Secrecy Act, repeal confidentiality laws and end reputational risk regulation to address debanking.

articles.title: India tightens crypto rules to fight money laundering and terror funding
articles.description: India's financial intelligence agency has announced stricter identity verification measures for cryptocurrency exchanges to prevent money laundering and terror financing.

articles.title: South Korea to lift ban on corporate crypto investment: Report
articles.description: South Korea’s FSC reportedly shared guidelines allowing listed companies to invest up to 5% of equity in the top 20 cryptocurrencies, ending a 2017 ban.

articles.title: Bitcoin, privacy coins rally as Trump-Powell conflict escalates
articles.description: The rally came shortly after Powell said that the DOJ had threatened him with criminal charges over his June 2025 congressional testimony.

articles.title: South Korean authorities seek 5% cap on corporate crypto investments: report
articles.description: South Korea's FSC is proposing a 5% cap on the share of a company's equity capital that can be allocated to digital asset investments.

articles.title: ​​Top UK Labour lawmakers push to ban political donations made in crypto
articles.description: The chairs of seven UK government committees have asked for a ban on crypto donations to be added to an elections bill set to be introduced soon.

articles.title: Bitcoin rises 1%, Nasdaq futures and dollar drop as Trump-Powell feud escalates
articles.description: Bitcoin's price movement diverged from the Nasdaq futures, which fell nearly 0.8%.

articles.title: Ethereum needs better decentralized stablecoins: Vitalik Buterin
articles.description: It isn’t a good idea to fully back a stablecoin with a single fiat currency, because if that nation-state fails, so will the stablecoin, argues Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin.

articles.title: Privacy tokens rally as XMR breaks all-time high
articles.description: XMR, ZEC, SOL and other alts are rallying as BTC remains rangebound

articles.title: Crypto YouTube views sink to lowest level since early 2021, ‘it’s not just X'
articles.description: Crypto content viewership on YouTube has plunged over the past three months, signaling bear market conditions as retail interest in crypto continues to decline.

articles.title: Bitcoin Shrugs Off Powell Probe as DOJ Targets Fed Chair
articles.description: Experts note Bitcoin’s hedge narrative could strengthen if ​​Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s criminal investigation is successful.

articles.title: Coinbase may reconsider support for US market structure bill: Bloomberg
articles.description: Coinbase may withdraw its support from the market structure bill if it imposes broader limits on stablecoin rewards, Bloomberg reported.

articles.title: Memecoins hit hardest in rough year that saw 11.6M tokens fail
articles.description: Memecoin launchpads such as pump.fun flooded the market in 2025 with millions of “low effort” coins, leading to a record number of crypto token failures.

articles.title: Fed’s Powell says DOJ probe reflects ‘pressure’ over rate policy independence
articles.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said a Justice Department investigation should be viewed in the context of mounting political pressure over the Fed’s interest rate independence.

articles.title: Prediction markets downplay Powell exit risk despite DOJ probe: Asia Morning Briefing
articles.description: Traders on Polymarket and Kalshi are shrugging off the idea that a criminal investigation into the chair of the Federal Reserve would have him removed from his role early.

articles.title: Coinbase could pull CLARITY Act support over stablecoin rewards ban
articles.description: The crypto-focused markets structure bill is set to be discussed at a markup session on Thursday. On the line is the ability for stablecoin issuers to offer rewards via crypto exchanges.

articles.title: The Funding: Why token buybacks are suddenly back in focus
articles.description: In this edition, we explore why token buybacks are back in the spotlight, when they work, and when teams should think twice.

articles.title: X to roll out ‘Smart Cashtags’ for crypto, stocks next month
articles.description: Smart Cashtags aim to enable users to track real-time price movements of crypto tokens and stocks, building on X’s long-term vision to become an Everything App.

articles.title: Monero Sets New Record Price as Privacy Trade Re-Emerges
articles.description: Monero’s push to a record high follows renewed interest in privacy-focused coins, even as uneven liquidity complicates price signals.

articles.title: X Plans ‘Smart Cashtags’ to Link Crypto and Stock Tickers to Live Prices
articles.description: X is developing a feature that turns ticker symbols in posts into links for real-time pricing and asset-specific information.

articles.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
articles.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

articles.title: ETH-BTC ratio bottomed in April, mirrors 2019 cycle: Analyst
articles.description: The Ethereum ecosystem continues to see increased development and value locked in tokenized assets, according to market analyst Michaël van de Poppe.

articles.title: UK committee chairs push for crypto political donations ban, adding pressure to Labour government
articles.description: Reform UK became the first UK political party to accept crypto donations in May 2025, though a £9m donation from a crypto investor was made in fiat.

articles.title: India tightens KYC requirements for crypto user onboarding
articles.description: Tax and other regulatory agencies in India claim that cryptocurrencies and permissionless blockchain tech undermine tax collection.

articles.title: JPMorgan downplays stablecoin threat as local bankers warn of $6.6 trillion risk
articles.description: The ABA sent a letter to the U.S. Senate, saying stablecoins that offer yields will affect its banking members ability to grant loans, but JPMorgan disagrees.

articles.title: Elon Musks's X teases crypto-aware ‘smart cashtags’ just day after community backlash
articles.description: Nikita Bier, X’s head of product, outlined plans for asset-aware Smart Cashtags a day after criticism from parts of the crypto community over a now-deleted post.

articles.title: Vitalik Buterin says decentralized stablecoins still face three unsolved problems
articles.description: Buterin suggested that long-term stablecoin sustainability may require independence from the dollar entirely, given the possibility of future debasement.

articles.title: Ethereum treasury company BitMine crosses 1 million staked ETH milestone
articles.description: The latest staking move highlights the growing scale of corporate Ethereum treasuries as firms look to generate yield on idle crypto holdings.

articles.title: Monero’s XMR hits $500 for the first time since 2021 as rival Zcash fumbles
articles.description: History shows XMR has repeatedly failed near record highs, risking another sharp pullback unless it decisively breaks above $500–$520.

articles.title: Walmart and Google bet on AI agents to reshape how people shop online
articles.description: The retail giant said a new Gemini integration reflects a broader shift from search-based shopping to AI systems that can act on a customer’s behalf.

articles.title: As the market tanks, crypto’s new gold rush is…gold
articles.description: The huge spike in onchain gold signals is that DeFi investors are planning to stay in DeFi, even when the tide turns, argues RAAC founder Kevin Rusher.

articles.title: Bitcoin bear market still in play as power law sees $65K ‘do-or-die’ price
articles.description: Bitcoin power law analysis concluded that price may face a new battle around $65,000 if BTC spends 2026 as a year of consolidation.

articles.title: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin warns decentralized stablecoins still have deep flaws
articles.description: The Ethereum co-founder argues that price benchmarks, oracle security and staking incentives remain unresolved challenges for decentralized stablecoins.

articles.title: Ethereum’s future hinges on zero-knowledge proofs, EF director says
articles.description: In a recent interview with CoinDesk, Ethereum Foundation co-executive director Hsiao-Wei Wang described zero-knowledge as part of Ethereum’s midterm roadmap, pointing to “many amazing breakthroughs” i

articles.title: Russians ask government hotlines whether pensions are paid in crypto
articles.description: Crypto-related questions about pension payments are reaching Russia’s Social Fund hotline, suggesting digital assets are entering mainstream financial concerns.

articles.title: CryptoQuant founder slams X for penalizing crypto content instead of bots
articles.description: X’s head of product said Crypto Twitter’s reach problems are self-inflicted, blaming overposting rather than algorithmic suppression.

articles.title: Tennessee sends cease-and-desist letters to Kalshi, Polymarket, Crypto.com
articles.description: Tennessee regulator warned that failure to comply could trigger steep fines, court injunctions and potential law enforcement referrals for for further investigation.

articles.title: Samson Mow tips Elon Musk will ‘go hard’ into Bitcoin in 2026
articles.description: Jan3 founder Samson Mow’s predictions are among the more bullish outlooks compared with most recent forecasts from other crypto market participants.

articles.title: Ethereum sentiment mirrors levels seen before ‘major run’: Santiment
articles.description: Ethereum’s social media sentiment is “kind of reminiscent” of what was seen before its last major run, according to Santiment.
